highlighted_projects.description: Using Unity and various loyalty free assets created a simple fighting game. Linked Animations together, scripted the entire game, and setup sound effects.
highlighted_projects.name: Basic Fighting Game

highlighted_projects.description: Used Machine learning technology to create a program that can solve CAPTCHA test if the questions are all handwritten numbers. Afterwards Computer vision technology was used in order to test accuracy changes. To do such various filters were applied to see if they would help the program recognize it or if it made the result more obscure.
highlighted_projects.name: CAPTCHA Test Solver

jarvis_projects.description: Monitors activity on different clusters and records information to an sql table to allow the user to monitor usage over time and manipulate the data.
jarvis_projects.name: Cluster Monitor

name: Brandon Angod

summary: My name is Brandon Angod. I graduated from Ontario Tech University with a major in Computer Science. Currently I am a Software Developer for Jarvis Consulting Group.The software industry excites me the most with how it has grown over the years and learn as much information within the industry as I can.
